stories.Title: Methane propulsion gets to orbit
stories.Description: Zhuque-2 has reached its goal by becoming the first methane-fueled rocket to reach orbit. Showcasing China's dedication to pushing boundaries in space technology.
stories.Tweet: Methane propulsion gets to orbit 📦 Zhuque-2 has reached its goal by becoming the first methane-fueled rocket to reach orbit. Showcasing China's dedication to pushing boundaries in space technology. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/chinas-landspace-reaches-orbit-with-methane-powered-zhuque-2-rocket/

stories.Title: Janus stays grounded
stories.Description: NASA's Janus mission experiences a disappointing turn of events. Budget constraints and launch delays have left the spacecraft stranded in storage.
stories.Tweet: Janus stays grounded 📦 NASA's Janus mission experiences a disappointing turn of events. Budget constraints and launch delays have left the spacecraft stranded in storage. #rocketscience https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/nasa-decides-not-to-launch-two-already-built-asteroid-probes/

stories.Title: An explosive setback
stories.Description: Technical challenges continue for Blue Origin as a BE-4 engine explodes during a firing test. While no one was harmed, the incident poses a setback for the company's engine production.
stories.Tweet: An explosive setback 📦 Technical challenges continue for Blue Origin as a BE-4 engine explodes during a firing test. While no one was harmed, the incident poses a setback for the company's engine production. #blueorigin https://www.engadget.com/blue-origin-is-investigating-why-a-rocket-engine-exploded-during-testing-210049055.html

stories.Title: AI is not a concern for Bill Gates
stories.Description: In a new blog post, Bill Gates stands firm on his support for AI development. Contrary to his peers, Gates believes that while AI poses risks, history has shown that we can effectively manage them.
stories.Tweet: AI is not a concern for Bill Gates 📦 In a new blog post, Bill Gates stands firm on his support for AI development. Contrary to his peers, Gates believes that while AI poses risks, history has shown that we can effectively manage them. #ai https://www.techtimes.com/articles/293690/20230712/bill-gates-worried-ai-potential-risks.htm

stories.Title: More creativity for DALL-E
stories.Description: Shutterstock and OpenAI have renewed their partnership for another six years. Granting the company access to Shutterstock's rich repository of content for training its models.
stories.Tweet: More creativity for DALL-E 📦 Shutterstock and OpenAI have renewed their partnership for another six years. Granting the company access to Shutterstock's rich repository of content for training its models. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/11/23791528/openai-shutterstock-images-partnership

stories.Title: OpenAI gets a Chinese contender
stories.Description: China's Baichuan-13B, a powerful LLM, has entered the arena. Trained on vast Chinese and English data, this open-source model plans to tackle OpenAI's GPT-3.5.
stories.Tweet: OpenAI gets a Chinese contender 📦 China's Baichuan-13B, a powerful LLM, has entered the arena. Trained on vast Chinese and English data, this open-source model plans to tackle OpenAI's GPT-3.5. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/11/chinas-search-engine-pioneer-unveils-open-source-large-language-model-to-rival-openai/

stories.Title: AI holds the key to workplace efficiency
stories.Description: Generative AI is a technology that reshapes industries, as it holds big potential for simplifying collaboration, enhancing workflows, and improving innovative thinking.
stories.Tweet: AI holds the key to workplace efficiency 📦 Generative AI is a technology that reshapes industries, as it holds big potential for simplifying collaboration, enhancing workflows, and improving innovative thinking. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/generative-ai-will-improve-efficiencies-and-spark-creativity-in-the-workplace/

stories.Title: Introducing: Afforai
stories.Description: Effortlessly understand and interact with your documents using Afforai's AI technology. A chatbot that surpasses others in accuracy, coverage, and comprehension.

stories.Title: Nothing redefines the Android experience
stories.Description: All the hype was justified! The Phone 2 exceeds expectations with its remarkable camera sensors, Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1 chipset, and captivating LTPO OLED display.
stories.Tweet: Nothing redefines the Android experience 📦 All the hype was justified! stories.Title: CLI command now available for GitHub projects
stories.Description: The new project command for CLI streamlines planning and collaboration, bringing efficiency to your developer teams.
stories.Tweet: CLI command now available for GitHub projects 📦 The new project command for CLI streamlines planning and collaboration, bringing efficiency to your developer teams. #GitHub https://github.blog/2023-07-11-github-cli-project-command-is-now-generally-available/

stories.Title: A mesmerizing gift from Webb
stories.Description: Celebrating its first year of science operations, Webb has unveiled a breathtaking image of a star-forming region in the Rho Ophiuchi cloud complex.
stories.Tweet: A mesmerizing gift from Webb 📦 Celebrating its first year of science operations, Webb has unveiled a breathtaking image of a star-forming region in the Rho Ophiuchi cloud complex. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2023/webb-celebrates-first-year-of-science-with-new-image
